segment.source: How to Upgrade the Application Virtualization Sequencer
segment.target: How to Upgrade the Application Virtualization Sequencer

segment.source: How to Upgrade the Application Virtualization Sequencer
segment.target: How to Upgrade the Application Virtualization Sequencer

segment.source: How to Upgrade the Application Virtualization Sequencer
segment.target: How to Upgrade the Application Virtualization Sequencer

segment.source: Upgrading from previous versions of the Sequencer is not supported.
segment.target: Upgrading from previous versions of the Sequencer is not supported.

segment.source: You must uninstall any previous versions of the Sequencer and then install Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer 4.5.
segment.target: You must uninstall any previous versions of the Sequencer and then install Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer 4.5.

segment.source: However, Virtual applications created using an earlier version of the Sequencer can be opened and edited using Sequencer 4.5.
segment.target: However, Virtual applications created using an earlier version of the Sequencer can be opened and edited using Sequencer 4.5.

segment.source: To upgrade the Sequencer on computers running Windows Vista
segment.target: To upgrade the Sequencer on computers running Windows Vista

segment.source: To uninstall previous installations of the Sequencer, open Control Panel and select Programs and Features.
segment.target: To uninstall previous installations of the Sequencer, open Control Panel and select Programs and Features.

segment.source: Select the older version from the list, and then click Uninstall.
segment.target: Select the older version from the list, and then click Uninstall.

segment.source: To confirm the uninstall, click Yes in the Programs and Features dialog box.
segment.target: To confirm the uninstall, click Yes in the Programs and Features dialog box.

segment.source: After you have completed uninstalling the previous Sequencer version, install Application Virtualization Sequencer 4.5.
segment.target: After you have completed uninstalling the previous Sequencer version, install Application Virtualization Sequencer 4.5.

segment.source: For more information about installing Sequencer 4.5, see How to Install the Application Virtualization Sequencer.
segment.target: For more information about installing Sequencer 4.5, see How to Install the Application Virtualization Sequencer.

segment.source: To upgrade the Sequencer on computers running Windows XP
segment.target: To upgrade the Sequencer on computers running Windows XP

segment.source: To uninstall previous installations of the Sequencer, open Control Panel and select Add or Remove Programs.
segment.target: To uninstall previous installations of the Sequencer, open Control Panel and select Add or Remove Programs.

segment.source: Select the older version from the list, and then click Remove.
segment.target: Select the older version from the list, and then click Remove.

segment.source: To confirm the uninstall, click Yes in the Add or Remove Programs dialog box.
segment.target: To confirm the uninstall, click Yes in the Add or Remove Programs dialog box.

segment.source: After you have completed uninstalling the previous Sequencer version, install Application Virtualization Sequencer 4.5.
segment.target: After you have completed uninstalling the previous Sequencer version, install Application Virtualization Sequencer 4.5.

segment.source: For more information about installing Sequencer 4.5, see How to Install the Application Virtualization Sequencer.
segment.target: For more information about installing Sequencer 4.5, see How to Install the Application Virtualization Sequencer.
